alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 10:20AM EST until March 05 at 2:38AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky... Ohio River at Tell City affecting Hancock and Perry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Tell City. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 41.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 AM CST Wednesday was 41.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 27.0 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 41.6 feet on 04/19/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
